content:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Waymo has received approval to operate its robotaxi service to and from San Jose airport, marking its first airport operation in California.
• This expansion follows nearly two years of Waymo operating at Phoenix airport.
• The approval indicates growing regulatory acceptance of autonomous vehicle technology in transportation.

**Why it matters**
• This decision will offer travelers and residents in the San Jose area an innovative transportation option.
• The expansion validates Waymo's technology and business model, potentially attracting more investment and partnerships.

**Risks**
• Public perception and trust in autonomous vehicles could be affected by any safety incidents or service disruptions.

**Opportunities**
• Waymo can gather valuable operational data and user feedback in a new environment, refining its technology and service.

**Market view**
Market — Positive for Waymo and the autonomous vehicle industry, signaling expansion and regulatory acceptance.

**Sources**
https://techcrunch.com/2025/09/04/waymo-cleared-to-offer-robotaxi-rides-at-san-jose-airport/

────────────────────────────────
